name: BeyondMotherhood
tag_list: moms, jobs, part-time-jobs, flexible-staffing, work-life-balance, employers
overview:
Beyond Motherhood is a site created to help moms figure out if, when and how to get back into the workforce. A job site-online magazine hybrid, Beyond Motherhood offers moms considering dusting off the briefcase everything from networking tips and resume advice to guest blogs from best-selling authors and links to job leads.

The brainchild of working mom Shannon Davis, Beyond Motherhood is at its heart a community of women lending their voices, stories and expertise to help the new mom looking for a more family friendly profession, the empty nester ready for her next chapter and the harried mother of teens looking for a part-time job.

More than a site full of content to support and inspire moms, Beyond Motherhood offers practical advice on how to interview, write a cover letter, research a potential position and update a professional style. For those moms looking to switch careers altogether Beyond Motherhood has created a Momternship program. This revolutionary program allows working moms to test out a new career path, gaining experience and contacts at little risk.

With a constantly changing homepage tracking the latest news, videos, blogs and links of interest to the sites readers, there is always a reason to clink onto Beyond Motherhood.
